channel.title: How to no clip quicker with peters map editor
channel.description: ok so im using peters map editor to make custom maps for my rsps project and well since im recoloring/resizing parts where its just water it is all clipped. and im making sorta big custom map and im wondering if theres an easier/QUICKER way to no clip the tiles because noclipping 1000 tiles would take... bout forever. just wondering if anyone knows a quicker way thanks also i went into the coding of the map editor and was trying to see if i could make something like if the tile is selected and i click key 'b' it would make it auto no clip but im not experienced enough in java to know how to make that. well any help/info would be awesome thanks

item.title: How to no clip quicker with peters map editor
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:

ok so im using peters map editor to make custom maps for my rsps project and well since im recoloring/resizing parts where its just water it is all clipped. and im making sorta big custom map and im wondering if theres an easier/QUICKER way to no clip the tiles because noclipping 1000 tiles would take… bout forever. just wondering if anyone knows a quicker way thanks also i went into the coding of the map editor and was trying to see if i could make something like if the tile is selected and i click key ‘b’ it would make it auto no clip but im not experienced enough in java to know how to make that. well any help/info would be awesome thanks
